replies.body:
Executioner Mundo is not a concept, since the skin already exists.
http://www.leagueofpapers.com/sites/default/files/Executioner-Mundo-Splash-Art-v2-league_of_papers.jpg

So this would just be an update for his splashart, but he will get his skins and splasharts updated when he gets his VGU anyway.
___________________
However, still like the 2 skins you are showing here being Leatherface Sion and Rockstar Soraka.
In general, I think we could use some more horror movie inspired skins. I would like to see a return of the Zombie and Slayer skin line, Slayer Jinx is one of my favourite skins ever created.

Oh darn. I didn't know, thanks for letting me know. It can be hard to keep track of what skins everyone has. 

As for the horror themed skins that you are referring to, yes I agree I would love to see more of those.

That's some sick nasty stuff right there, boss.

Upvoted.
I am in fucking love with rockstar soraka, but you could rename her to pentakill soraka which would give a fitting thematic to the idea to go with.

Omg Rockstar Soraka looks awesome. :O
The splasart looks so realistic as well!

Executioner Mundo is actually in the game already.

Edit: Someone pointed it out already so don't mind me.
